name: Esperides Beach Resort
description:
Immerse yourself in the splendor of Esperides Beach Resort, a 4-star, eco-conscious hotel situated in the breathtaking setting of Faliraki-Ammoudes, Rhodes, Greece. The resort seamlessly blends modern decoration, comfort, and awe-inspiring scenic views to provide an ideal escape for solo parents, families, young adults, couples, and beach enthusiasts. Our welcoming atmosphere and diverse offerings cater to every guest, ensuring a memorable stay for all.

Set across a main building and two auxiliary structures, the resort houses a total of 573 comfortable rooms, including various room types ideal for couples and families and also wheelchair-accessible options. Each room includes amenities like air conditioning, free WiFi, and a safe, while offering splendid views of the sea or the garden.

Boasting direct access to a private sandy-pebbly beach, the resort ensures a delightful beach experience with its free sun loungers and parasols. Located outside the city, the hotel has great connectivity with a bus stop just 200 meters away. It is in proximity to tourist attractions, city centre, marinas, and the Rhodes International Airport.

The Esperides Beach Resort takes pride in its versatile dining options. Feast at the Main Restaurant or the Food Hall that serve a variety of cuisines, including Italian, Greek, and Mediterranean food, or grab a quick bite at the Tutti Frutti snack bar. Unwind with a refreshing drink at our bars, including the Lagoon Pool Bar, Tutti Frutti Bar, or the main bar in the lobby.

The resort offers a wide range of facilities like a 24-hour reception, free parking, car and bike rental services, laundry service, and a doctor-on-call. The multilingual staff ensures a seamless experience for guests from around the globe. The resort also facilitates electric vehicle charging.
Fitness enthusiasts can use our well-equipped gym, tennis courts, and other sports facilities. The hotel offers a multitude of entertainment options, including a TV room, an arcade/gaming room, and a mini-market. The resort has 1 activity pool, 1 lagoon relax pool, a children's pool, a baby pool, and a combination of 3 water slides. The fun for the kids includes also a playground, making it perfect for families.

At the Esperides Beach Resort, our team is the backbone of our establishment. With a common goal to provide unparalleled service, every member from the housekeeping staff to the front desk representatives contributes their skills and hard work to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests. Our staff is selected for their friendliness and passion for hospitality, making each interaction a testament to our commitment to high quality services.

Step into a world of unparalleled experiences at Esperides Beach Resort, where the perfect blend of family fun, sustainable initiatives, and iconic Greek hospitality awaits. Your dream holiday is just around the corner!
